description: Covers a variety of HTCondor job queries for list, status, and submission tools.

cases.name: Case 1
cases.description: Show me all jobs.

data.query: Show me all jobs.
expected_response_substrings: Jobs in the queue: | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...

cases.name: Case 2
cases.description: List all running jobs for user alice.

data.query: List all running jobs for user alice.
expected_response_substrings: Jobs for user alice (Running): | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...

cases.name: Case 3
cases.description: Show idle jobs.

data.query: Show idle jobs.
expected_response_substrings: Idle jobs: | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...

cases.name: Case 4
cases.description: Show jobs for user bob.

data.query: Show jobs for user bob.
expected_response_substrings: Jobs for user bob: | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...

cases.name: Case 5
cases.description: Show held jobs for user alice.

data.query: Show held jobs for user alice.
expected_response_substrings: Jobs for user alice (Held): | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...

cases.name: Case 6
cases.description: Show me jobs with an invalid status.

data.query: Show me jobs with an invalid status.
expected_response_substrings: No jobs found or error: Invalid status 'foobar'.

cases.name: Case 7
cases.description: Show jobs for a non-existent user xyz.

data.query: Show jobs for a non-existent user xyz.
expected_response_substrings: No jobs found for user xyz.

cases.name: Case 8
cases.description: What's the status of job 1234567?

data.query: What's the status of job 1234567?
expected_response_substrings: Job 1234567 status: - Owner: ... - Status: ... - ProcId: ...

cases.name: Case 9
cases.description: Get status for job 9999999.

data.query: Get status for job 9999999.
expected_response_substrings: Job not found or error: No job with ClusterId 9999999.

cases.name: Case 10
cases.description: Get status for job with missing id.

data.query: Get status for job with missing id.
expected_response_substrings: Error: cluster_id is required.

cases.name: Case 11
cases.description: Submit a job to run /bin/sleep 100.

data.query: Submit a job to run /bin/sleep 100.
expected_response_substrings: Job submitted successfully! New ClusterId: ...

cases.name: Case 12
cases.description: Submit a job with missing executable.

data.query: Submit a job with missing executable.
expected_response_substrings: Error: 'executable' is required to submit a job.

cases.name: Case 13
cases.description: Submit a job with invalid arguments.

data.query: Submit a job with invalid arguments.
expected_response_substrings: Job submitted, but may fail due to invalid arguments.

cases.name: Case 14
cases.description: Submit a job with all fields.

data.query: Submit a job with all fields.
expected_response_substrings: Job submitted successfully! New ClusterId: ...

cases.name: Case 15
cases.description: Show me the last 5 jobs for user alice.

data.query: Show me the last 5 jobs for user alice.
expected_response_substrings: Jobs for user alice (last 5): | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...

cases.name: Case 16
cases.description: Show me all completed jobs.

data.query: Show me all completed jobs.
expected_response_substrings: Completed jobs: | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...

cases.name: Case 17
cases.description: Show me all jobs with status 2.

data.query: Show me all jobs with status 2.
expected_response_substrings: Error or jobs with status code 2 (Running).

cases.name: Case 18
cases.description: Show me jobs for user alice with status running and limit 2.

data.query: Show me jobs for user alice with status running and limit 2.
expected_response_substrings: Jobs for user alice (Running, limit 2): | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...

cases.name: Case 19
cases.description: Get status for job with non-integer id abc.

data.query: Get status for job with non-integer id abc.
expected_response_substrings: Error: cluster_id must be an integer.

cases.name: Case 20
cases.description: Submit a job with empty description.

data.query: Submit a job with empty description.
expected_response_substrings: Error: 'executable' is required to submit a job.

cases.name: Case 21
cases.description: Show me jobs for user alice with an ambiguous status.

data.query: Show me jobs for user alice with an ambiguous status.
expected_response_substrings: Error or jobs for ambiguous status 'active'.

cases.name: Case 22
cases.description: Show me all jobs for user alice and status running and held.

data.query: Show me all jobs for user alice and status running and held.
expected_response_substrings: Error: Multiple statuses not supported.

cases.name: Case 23
cases.description: Show me jobs for user alice with a very high limit.

data.query: Show me jobs for user alice with a very high limit.
expected_response_substrings: Jobs for user alice (first 1000 or capped at max allowed): | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...

cases.name: Case 24
cases.description: Submit a job with a non-existent executable.

data.query: Submit a job with a non-existent executable.
expected_response_substrings: Job submission failed or job will fail to start.

cases.name: Case 25
cases.description: Show me all jobs for user alice with status removed.

data.query: Show me all jobs for user alice with status removed.
expected_response_substrings: Jobs for user alice (Removed): | ClusterId | ProcId | Status | Owner | ...
